bug.author: damianmoore
bug.summary: Same photo appears multiple times when selecting an object tag that has more than one occurrence
bug.description: A good example of this is when there is more than one tree in a photo and you select "Tree" from the "Objects" filters

comments.comment: Probably would be resolved when <denchmark-link:https://github.com/damianmoore/photonix/issues/70>#70</denchmark-link> is implemented
